Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: aur allaah ke muqaabale mein sarakashee na karo, main tumhaare lie ek spasht pramaan lekar aaya hoon
aur main isase apane rab aur tumhaare rab kee sharan le chuka hoon ki tum mujh par patharaav karake maar daalo
kintu yadi tum meree baat nahin maanate to mujhase alag ho jao
antatah usane apane rab ko pukaara ki "ye aparaadhee log hai.
achchha tum raaton raat mere bandon ko lekar chale jao. nishchay hee tumhaara peechha kiya jaega
aur saagar ko sthir chhod do. ve to ek sena dal hain, doob jaanevaale.
ve chhod gaye kitanai hee baag aur srot
aur khetiyaan aur uttam aavaas
aur sukh saamagree jinamen ve maze kar rahe the.
ham aisa hee maamala karate hai, aur un cheezon ka vaaris hamane doosare logon ko banaaya
phir na to aakaash aur dharatee ne unapar vilaap kiya aur na unhen muhalat hee milee
is prakaar hamane isaraeel kee santaan ko apamaanajanak yaatana se
arthaat firaun se chhutakaara diya. nishchay hee vah maryaadaaheen logon mein se bada hee sarakash tha
aur hamane (unakee sthiti ko) jaanate hue unhen saare sansaaravaalon ke muqaabale man chun liya
aur hamane unhen nishaaniyon ke dvaara vah cheez dee jisamen spasht pareeksha thee
ye log badee drdhataapoorvak kahate hai
bas yah hamaaree pahalee mrtyu hee hai, ham dobaara uthae jaanevaale nahin hain
to le aao hamaare baap-daada ko, yadi tum sachche ho
kya ve achchhe hai ya tubba kee qaum ya ve log jo unase pahale guzar chuke hai? hamane unhen vinasht kar diya, nishchay hee ve aparaadhee the
hamane aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake beech hai unhen khel nahin banaaya
hamane unhen haq ke saath paida kiya, kintu unamen se adhikakar log jaanate nahin
